channel.title: 94DN - Mapping Social and Environmental Space on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library
channel.description: Recent content in 94DN - Mapping Social and Environmental Space on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: Spring 2023 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: Trying to understand things encodes them sometimes Descriptive map of London poverty, 1889 in the Harvard Map Collection. New technologies and ethical grey space Data-Smart City Solutions from Harvard Kennedy Schools' Ash Center. Being up front in your maps/data about your motivations Spaces of Avoidance project by Alie Kilts. Letting people in to allow critique Land-Grab Univerisities interactive digital project. Mapping Inequality project via the University of Richmond's Digital Scholarship Lab.
